projects.preview_description: I am a scientist at Harvard Medical School. For an academic research paper , we've built two random
projects.description:
I am a scientist at Harvard Medical School. For an academic research paper , we've built two random forest models in Python. These models take in 30+ datapoints about the health status of a mouse and return predictions about its future health status. We would like to make these models available for widespread research use. 

Currently the models have been saved with pickle (file.sav). We would like to build a website where an user can upload an excel or csv file with each column representing a parameter in the model, and each row representing an animal. 

This would ideally be done with a Django or Flask app. We attempted to make a Shiny app ourselves, using reticulate to get Python to run in R, but were unsuccessful. Likely there is a version issue. We made the models using sklearn version 19 and Python 3.7. There likely needs to be some version control issues and we would need to confirm that the models run successfully.

We also envision a tab on the web app with background information in the form of text, links, and downloadable pdf files. 

We have our own server from which we can host the web app once complete.
projects.title: Build a website hosting python ML models for other users to use (Django/Flask/Shiny app)

projects.preview_description: I need a script that runs and monitors CPU usage and reboots the machine if average CPU is below e.
projects.description:
I need a script that runs and monitors CPU usage and reboots the machine if average CPU is below e. g. 5% average within e. g. 1 minute. The script should also write a log file. Log file max size is limited to e. g. 2 MB (rotating log). The exact values can be stored in a config file.

The script needs to work on Ubuntu 18.x and 19.x. As for the programming or scripting language, Python, Node.JS, Shell scripting or C++ is ok. The script and how to install it should be well documented.

In your bid, please mention which programming or scripting language you prefer or recommend to use for this task.

If you know of an existing tool that can do this, please let me know and I would send you a “thank you” bonus right away.
projects.title: Linux script to monitor CPU usage

projects.preview_description: We are looking for a Sr ML Engineer , who is passionate about Selecting features and building recomm
projects.description:
We are looking for a Sr ML Engineer , who is passionate about Selecting features and building recommendation engines using machine learning techniques.If you live & breath engineering by solving not only engineering problems but are passionate about building state of the art products that help a billion users to evolutionize the human experience in the Healthcare Domain by joining the world class  team, then welcome to the Techolution!

Title  : Sr ML Engineer
Location: Hyderabad

Job Requirements:

Must have experience with working on Recommendation Systems.
Must be well-versed with deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or Keras.
Must be proficient in Python and other machine learning languages
Deep understanding of data structures, data modeling, and software architecture.
Ability to conduct a rigorous analysis of data and chart out clear take away(s) from Big Data sources.
Python packages such as Numpy, Scipy, Pandas, Sklearn, Matplotlib and Tensorflow/Keras.
Experience with various messaging systems, such as Kafka or RabbitMQ will be considered a plus
Should possess the ability to design solutions independently based on high-level architecture.
Deploying the model into production, detecting anomalies, fine-tuning HyperParameters, and cross-validating as needed.
Estimating resources, GPU requirements, analyzing the cost of running a continuous. a recommendation engine, ensuring the stability of the model, performance, accuracy, etc.

Responsibilities:

Selecting features and building recommendation engines using machine learning techniques.
Data pre-processing using state-of-the-art methods.
Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytical systems.
Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets.
Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.
Coordinate with various devs and businesses to implement models and monitor outcomes.

Why Join Techolution?

Be part of the next most admired high tech brand in the world and launch the next most exciting billion dollar IPO. We are looking for talent with amazing technical skills with a great foundation for the open role. The type of personalities that do very well at our company are people who are looking to contribute a larger than life cause. People who are looking for a very high growth environment where they are helping the company grow and also personally growing through a very unique and world class exposure.

Work Life at Techolution:

At Techolution, we do things a bit differently. There's no corporate nonsense, and no old fashioned hierarchy. Instead, we work in dozens of self sufficient, autonomous teams. Think of them like startups within a startup that learn from each other. You are your own boss! We're going to be upfront the way we work doesn't suit everyone. But if freedom, autonomy, and life affirming, head scratching professional challenges rock your world, we could be a match made in heaven.

About Techolution:
 
Techolution is a U.S.based, global business technology Company on a mission to accelerate digital transformation for our clients across the globe. We are a very successful startup that is small enough to care and large enough to be trusted by some of the top brands in the world such as Apple, JPMC, DBS Bank, NBC, Stryker, JCrew, etc. Techolution specializes in UI Modernization,  Cloud Transformation, Internet of Things, Big Data & Artificial Intelligence. We enable our customers with UX Design & Project Management services to achieve digital product excellence through our signature optimization of Agile methodology called “High Velocity Product Development” (HVPD). As a testament to the power of HVPD, we have developed a wealth of world class products, owned by Techolution, in the space of Virtual Reality, Facial Recognition, Smart City, Smart Water Monitoring and many more cutting edge digital products in the pipeline.

projects.preview_description: I have put together a custom pi running raspbian that creates an access point if it can't connect to
projects.description:
I have put together a custom pi running raspbian that creates an access point if it can't connect to a wifi connection set within wpa_supplicant.conf. A mobile app connects to this connection and gives the phone access to a PHP API on the Pi.

The user is then prompted on the phone to enter their wifi credentials and connection details. The issue I am dealing with is verifying credentials after a client entry. If the user enters an incorrect password I need to be able to prompt them to try entering it again.

The app submits the login details to a PHP API running on the device that has permissions set to update the wpa_supplicant.conf file. Once the file is updated I need to be able to test and check for a connection. From what I understand you can not check a wifi connection without connecting to it. This creates an issue as connecting to another connection will shutdown my access point breaking the api connection.

I am looking for a solution to this issue.  I am open to creating any js, php, python or command line scripts needed to make this work.
projects.title: Raspberry Pi Check WiFi Credentials from php API

projects.preview_description:
Web to be scraped:
http://transparency.engie.com/REM_REMIT/HomePage.aspx

Tasks:
1)	To scrap all the
projects.description:
Web to be scraped:
http://transparency.engie.com/REM_REMIT/HomePage.aspx

Tasks:
1)	To scrap all the Urgent Market Messages (UMM) available on the website (as from December 2011). Total around 29000 messages
2)	To create the database of power plants (part of the data included in UMM)
3)	Create the program to scrap the website at the defined interval

AD point 1
Website: http://transparency.engie.com/REM_REMIT/HomePage.aspx

1)	Click icon POWER:
2)	Chose the time when the message was published:
The year:
The month:
 
3)	Click on the UMM to be scraped
4)	The data from UMM should be saved in the following format (that’s an example from the other database).
Type of the database to use – MongoDB or Cosmos DB

{
    "_id" : ObjectId("5df42e7a52eb84588d3c5245"),
    "status" : "Inactive",
    "identifier" : "05470_EDF_T_00043331",
    "version" : 2,
    "name" : "PALUEL 1",
    "sector" : "Nuclear",
    "start_date" : {
        "$date" : 1576188000000
    },
    "end_date" : {
        "$date" : 1576274400000
    },
    "pub_date" : {
        "$date" : 1576225269000
    },
    "type" : "Planned",
    "cause" : "Complementary informations",
    "extra_info" : "After its restart, the plant will gradually return by various load threshold to full power. The ramp-up period will take at least 48 hours.\nFirst threshold after restart : 540MW\n-----------------------------------------------------------------------\nAprès son recouplage, la tranche remontera progressivement par palier de charge à sa pleine puissance. La remontée durera au moins 48h.\nPremier palier à atteindre : 540 MW",
    "max_power" : 1330,
    "available_power" : 0
}

AD point 2 (To create the database of power plants)
UMM from point 1 contain all the information we are looking for.
There will be however many UMM concerning the same power plant.

We need to create a database containing:
“Installed Capacity (MW)”
“Fuel type”
“Bidding zone”
“Affected asset”

The Database should be in the following format:
{
    "_id" : ObjectId("5e0488e704acf0e036fbe1f7"),
    "affected_asset" : "DROGENBOS 1",
    "installed_capacity" : 460
    "fuel_type " : “fossil_gas”
    "bidding_zone " : “10YBE”

}


Last important points:
a.	time difference between UK and Europe (1h)
b.	time change (winter/summer) during spring and autumn (UK and mainland Europe)

AD point 3
The scraper should be written in python.
projects.title: scrap a website ENGIE in python

projects.preview_description:
Hello, everyone.
As a Data Analyst or Data Scientist at Lime, you will be building the core technolo
projects.description:
Hello, everyone.
As a Data Analyst or Data Scientist at Lime, you will be building the core technology that powers our fleet of connected vehicles. We're launching our service quickly across the world, and you’ll be focusing on building the back end systems that can process boatloads of requests from our IoT devices and various consume/enterprise apps. You will also be given the chance to improve our suite of operational tools that enable our distributed workforce to charge, deploy, and maintain our electric vehicles. You’ll be working alongside a group of engineers, designers, and PMs from top schools and with experience building systems and apps at companies like Facebook, Twitter, Uber, and Square.
About you:
- Degree in Computer Science or equivalent technical background
- 2+ years experience in the industry, via internships or full-time positions
- You are fluent in at least one Data Science / Data Analysis Tech, such as Python, R, Julia
- You have experience working with relational databases - SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle
- You speak English fluently
- You have knowledge of finance a little.
What we offer:
- 50 ~ 100USD / hour 
- 40hours / week (but flexible)
- Full remote condition
Important:
You don't have to relocate. We will hire you on Freelancer.com platform and you will be billed here.
projects.title: Data Analyst | Data Scientist Position for Lime (Full Remote Position)

projects.preview_description: I'm considering using BackTrader as the central processor of a simulation/trading platform. BackTrad
projects.description: I'm considering using BackTrader as the central processor of a simulation/trading platform. BackTrader is written in Python and some have told me that Python is not as fast as some other software languages, but it is easier to use for development. I've run a simple strategy through another simulation platform called TradingBlox and have some results. I have taken a Python programming course, have programmed in FoxPro, Visual Basic and Python, but don't consider myself an expert in either BackTrader or Python at this point, so I'm looking for a freelancer that can take the specs on a simple trend following strategy with a market direction filter and Keltner Bands to get in and out and a simple percent of equity position sizing method in BackTrader so I can see differences in the speed of the back-test versus TradingBlox. The tests will be run on my directory of prices on some 47,000 stocks (many of which have disappeared due to bankruptcy or mergers). For someone who knows BackTrader well, I'm thinking this an easy project. Sample data can be provided to debug the BackTrader benchmark, but when software development is complete I would like to run the new BackTrader modules against my 47,000 stock databases to get an accurate speed test. If the test goes well, there could be additional projects. Payment made promptly by Freelancer.com upon delivery.
projects.title: Speed Test Benchmark Testing of BackTrader/Python

I need a python code which implements KNN from scratch (basic python imports allowed) such as from math import.

https://machinelearningmastery.com/tutorial-to-implement-k-nearest-neighbors-in-python-from-scratch/
to make sure the code will classify a "new voter". Also include how well it fits (splitting into test and training data set), normalise the data set and also include a runtime counter and #anotations/explanations?
projects.title: Adapt KNN algorithm to my Data Set

projects.preview_description: I have Java application code from a Freelancer that requires special installation to be functional.
projects.description:
I have Java application code from a Freelancer that requires special installation to be functional. I don't need coding help, I need help with incorporating communications fixes to my build stream. The Freelancer said I need to do this:

File Name File path (You need to put the file on this path in your project) Package Name

1 TableView.java /TableCheck/appClientModule/tblcheck/view/TableView.java tblcheck.view
2 TableViewModel.java /TableCheck/appClientModule/tblcheck/viewmodel/TableViewModel.java tblcheck.viewmodel
3 TableView.fxml /TableCheck/appClientModule/tblcheck/view/TableView.fxml tblcheck.view
4 Table.java /TableCheck/appClientModule/tblcheck/model/Table.java tblcheck.model
5 LayoutDeserializer.java /TableCheck/appClientModule/tblcheck/helper/LayoutDeserializer.java tblcheck.helper
6 layout.json /TableCheck/layouts/layout.json

The way I understand how my code works is I have a folder call TableCheck. In this folder I have different folders with the complete set of code to run the application. An example name for one of the folders might be: Texican65. To start the application I setup the Task Scheduler to run the run.cmd file in the Texican65 folder. when this run.cmd file is ran, the application starts up and is running.

I had a Freelancer make change to provide extremely reliable communications over the network. After testing that code for several weeks, it appeared that code had the communications reliability that the program needed. When I asked for the source code, they said they would provide the source. After telling me twice that they would send the source, they never did. After lying twice to me, I could not deal with that Freelancer any more. Finally a third party of this Freelancer did provide the source code which is available.

That source code is a 66MB file which means that I can not upload on Freelancer. We will need to figure out a way to get this source folder to you. I don't understand how I integrate the communications fixes into my code base. I was told to setup the code as described above. But I don't get it.

The basic issue is I need to incorporate the communications fixed into my build stream of code so I can continue to make updates, fix errors and feature adds to the Java code. I have added one of the current folders for the Java application that is part of the current build stream without the communications fixes for reference.

Another point is that the server in this application talks to the Java clients and to a Python client. This Python communication link does not have the issues that the Java server to Java client has. We can not break the communication to the Python to improve the communications for the Java.

The milestone will be release once the code is tested and works for an extended period of time, three weeks, with both the Java and Python clients.
projects.title: Provide detail instructions on how to load Java application with reliable communication code on user system

projects.preview_description:
I want to create a scraper for a dutch marketplace which is similar to amazon.
The scraper should be
projects.description:
I want to create a scraper for a dutch marketplace which is similar to amazon.
The scraper should be an executable an not in python.

For example this seller.
https://www.bol.com/nl/w/4allshop/1018220/?page=500&view=list

Step1) First we need to get all van codes of this seller. Every product page you see "ean code".
             Because the website has pagination capped at 500 you have to be smart to get all 30.000 products.
The best way to do this is to select by price.
First 0-1, Second 1-2, Third 3-5 ETC.

Step 2) Once you have all can codes we have to insert them in the search box.
https://www.bol.com/nl/s/?searchtext=8712511145294
From there you extract data.
- First I need to know which seller is on the "buy box" and which price
- Secondly I need to know all other sellers, the price they offer the product for, and the delivery time which you can find on each page.

This is the main function, you need proxies to run this.
I want 5.000 products done every hour. If possible even more. I am open for suggestions.

Its a ongoing process to once you have all data, it should start over again to get fresh data.

I should be able to add unlimited seller accounts in the software.
The first option should run once every 3 weeks (so searching for ean codes)
The second option (find sellers and price) Should run as much as possible.

The tool should have the option to export all data to excel.
It should have the option to show me for which products a seller is on the buy box.
For example, seller x, what products is he in the buy box for.
He sells 30.000 products, and for these 2000 products hes in the buy box for.

Once this project is completed I need more upgrades to this software. We can create a new project for this then.
projects.title: Marketplace scraper

RESPONSABILITÀ
test
    Responsibilities and Duties:
        test functionalities of every microserv
projects.description:
RESPONSABILITÀ
test
    Responsibilities and Duties:
        test functionalities of every microservice
            especially test that newly implemented microservices match specifications
        write script in various languages for testing purpose:
            mainly microservices communicate via amqp protocol,
            develop test amqp messages, send and check results for every microservice
        high availability
            test that general functionality of the architecture is not lost upon some services failure
        scalability
            benchmark testing
    Skills:
        linux working environment
            remote work via ssh
        scripting languages, mainly bash, python or javascript
        amqp protocol (rabbit)
        mongodb basic usage

service monitoring and recovery
    Responsibilities and Duties:
        periodically interface with monitoring system
        check that host machines are always up and running
        check that microservices are always up and running
            every microservice should implement a health check
        check time series data consistency vs data sources
            specific script language can be developed for this purpose
        mongo db data maintenance
            data check and data check/insert (preferred via js script)
        backup monitoring consistency check

back-end software development
    Responsibilities and Duties:
        bash scripting for service deploy and maintenance
        java code review
        backup script
        python for raspberry
    Skills:
        nodejs
        java 8, with attention to:
            understanding of design pattern
            read/write to mongo db
            http and ftp data retrieval
            json and csv parsing
            amqp communication protocol
        git
        python 3


APPROCCIO:
GIUSTA ATTITUDINE, PROPENSIONE AL LAVORO, AFFIDABILITÀ, SENSO DI RESPONSABILITÀ, LAVORO IN TEAM, COMPETENZA creeranno un rapporto di collaborazione di lungo periodo. 

COSA CI ASPETTIAMO:

MONITORING: AFFIDABILITÀ E REATTIVITÀ PER GARANTIRE UN BUON LIVELLO DI SERVIZIO. Monitoraggio costante dei servizi e rapido intervento di ripristino.

SVILUPPO: 
"Prolific developers don’t always write a lot of code, instead they solve a lot of problems. The two things are not the same."
"When I’m working on a problem, I never think about beauty. I think only how to solve the problem. But when I have finished, if the solution is not beautiful, I know it is wrong."

DOVE SI LAVORA:
LAVORO DA REMOTO IN AUTONOMIA.
Incontri periodici di 1g a Milano (ogni mese circa).

COME LAVORIAMO:
I SERVIZI DEVONO ESSERE SEMPRE ATTIVI
RISPETTO DELLE DEADLINES -> "How does a project get to be a year late?… One day at a time."
INTERAZIONE CON IL TEAM DI SVILUPPO, QUANDO NECESSARIA, VIA SKYPE E BITBUCKET "We want more doers, fewer talkers"
DOCUMENTAZIONE ORDINATA, MA SEMPLICE, MINIMO INDISPENSABILE, 
SPECIFICHE E BUGS TRAMITE BITBUCKET -> “Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.”  
CODICE PULITO E LEGGIBILE -> "It’s OK to figure out murder mysteries, but you shouldn’t need to figure out code. You should be able to read it."

CONTRATTO:
Contratto: freelance 
Compenso: 1.000 - 1500 Euro/mese (a seconda del livello di competenza)

PROCESSO DI SELEZIONE:
(Removed by Freelancer.com Admin)

projects.description:
Firma un documento XML con el estandar XadES-BES.

Necesitamos desarrollar una clase en Python que reciba los siguientes argumentos:
1.- Un string que contiene un archivo XML
2.- La ruta del certificado formato p.12
3.- La clave del certificado.

Y debe devolver:
1.- Un string con el archivo XML firmado.

Las definiciones técnicas son las siguientes:
* Estándar de firma XadES_BES http://uri.etsi.org/01903/v1.3.2/ts_101903v010302p.pdf
* Versión del esquema 1.3.2 http://uri.etsi.org/01903/v1.3.2#
* Codificación UTF-8
* Tipo de firma ENVELOPED http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#enveloped-signature

Recalcamos que el desarrollo debe ser específicamente en Python.

projects.description:
We need to do the following:

upload a csv file with:

product sku | image_url
1234 | https://www.example.com/image_1.jpg

Then the script should extract the colours from the image and give back a csv with the following:

product sku | image_url | color 1 | color 2 | color 3 | color 4 | ect.
1234 | https://www.example.com/image_1.jpg | red | green | blue | ...

This should be descending, so first color should be the one with the most occurrence etc.

Now this there is a script used which you can download here: https://making.lyst.com/2014/02/22/color-detection/

Whole thing should then run on a digitalocean droplet or similar vps.

Please check the lyst link with the script and check if you can do it with that script.

Important: leave me a rough estimate of hours/time needed for the project on your bid. if not, your bid will be ignored.

projects.description:
Greetings.
I am looking for a programmer, specifically with knowledge in Python or something similar that allows you to program an Intelligent Software. 
I'm not looking for something too elaborate, It is a software with the ability to deduce the language level of a student.
The programmer would receive credit for his/her work... 
First of all, I clarify that DON´T NECESSARILY HAVE TO KNOW THE LANGUAGE, because I would take care of that part.
The language to evaluate is Chinese, specifically HSK and HSKK exams, BUT as I said before, I'm just looking for a person who makes the model/mockup of a chat bot and a simple selection section. The Software would have the ability to deduce according to the answers if it can continue doing the test (advancing levels) or if it has already reached its maximum capacities.
Of course, should welcome at the beginning and show at the end, what result got, that is, at what level it corresponds...
As a plus, it's not mandatory, would like to show at the end a sample of the errors or a message of what to improve to reach the next level, according to failures (I would indicate in which cases are considered failures).
Also, other plus It may be the possibility of recording the attempts of each student using their name or identity document as a user, to assess the evolution of the student... The percentage of progress can be shown at the end of the test or simply in a list that can be accessed at the beginning.
It would be good if it was pleasing to the eye, dynamic... I gives to the programmer freedom to give ideas or change according to criteria... 
I clarify that it is an initial module that will evolve, and that maybe it will join other modules that I am programming on my part.
So, It is also a possibility of constant work for the programmer, in case you want to be part of the project. If not, the agreed payment will simply be made.
I do not have a very high budget, but as explain, I'm looking for a functional prototype and then be improved. If you want to be part of the project, future payments could be much better. 
Aclaro, currently, is a 1 person project level, which is why there are limitations and need the hiring.
projects.title: NEED A PYTHON PROGRAMMER OR BASIC IA PROJECT

projects.preview_description: We are a roofing company and we require an addition to our company web app for roof measuring. Much
projects.description: We are a roofing company and we require an addition to our company web app for roof measuring. Much of the code will need to be performed on the front-end in real-time, storing the measured data to the backend afterwards. We already have code integrating Google Maps, manual drawing of a roof area and getting a simple measurement from it. We are looking to expand on this and streamline/polish the measuring process, later adding automatic roof detection. This needs to work on mobile devices as well as desktop. There are many different apps already out there, but we are looking to integrate roof measuring directly into our own company software which is Python/Django on the backend and Vue.JS on the front end. The app should read satellite images from Google Maps or similar free services and be able to identify and measure a roof accurately with minimal user input. The app should be able to detect the area in sq. feet along with the roof pitch. These detected values can then be corrected if necessary by the app user on-site. The roofs can be residential or commercial, and a variety of shapes and structures. This data is then saved to the backend database and used to generate detailed roof reports. Several example apps are RoofScope, AerialReports, RoofSnap, iRoofing and EagleView.
projects.title: Roof Measuring App in Vue.JS & Python/Django

projects.preview_description: In this role, you will lead a range of data analytics efforts, monitor and improve the performance o
projects.description:
In this role, you will lead a range of data analytics efforts, monitor and improve the performance of our Machine Learning and Natural Language Understanding (NLU) models.
Your responsibilities will include:
• Diving deep into data, doing analysis, and discovering patterns/root causes. Generate insights that drive the product.
• Analyze and evaluate the quality of data used for model training and testing
• Present proposals and results in a clear manner backed by data and coupled with actionable conclusions to drive business decisions
• Collaborate with scientists and engineers on data collection and feature design efforts
• Communicate your results to diverse audiences with effective writing and visualizations
BASIC QUALIFICATIONS
• MSc in Statistics, Engineering in Computer Science, or related quantitative field
• Experience with analyzing and quantifying data collected through crowd sourcing protocols
• Strong experience with descriptive statistics and visualization tools
• Solid experience with Natural Language Processing (NLP)
• Expert in Python; command line usage, e.g., Bash. Solid experience with SQL
• Knowledge of statistical modelling / machine learning techniques / Deep Learning (Good to have)
• Experience with data selection methods: identify how to choose which data for which experimental set ups
• Excellent communication and organizational skills with significant attention to detail
• Experience with big data tools (Hive, Pig) and familiarity/experience with AWS technology stack (S3, Redshift). (Good to have)
• Demonstrable track record dealing well with ambiguity, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in an agile, dynamic environment
NLP: Text Extraction from various sources (MS Word, plain text files, pdf files, html pages, etc.), Text Cleaning, Text Pre-Processing, Tokenization, POS tagging, NER, Dependency Parsing, Coreference Resolution, Feature Vector Generation (binary, count, tf-idf, etc.), word2vec, doc2vec, glove, RAKE, document similarity (Cosine, Jaccard, etc.), fuzzy text matching, Lexical and Semantic Information Extraction
Techniques: text clustering (k-means, DBSACN, etc.), text classification (Naïve Bayes, MAXENT, SVM, Tree Based models, other ML & Deep Learning models)
Tools:
Python expert level with packages like NLTK, spaCy, genism, Pattern, TextBlob, Vocabulary, Stanford CoreNLP Python wrappers. Text extraction tools like PDFMiner, Apache Tika with Python, PyPDF2, etc. pandas, sklearn, numpy, xgboost, matplotlib, keras, etc.
Other Guidelines:
1. The candidate should be very hands on with various Data Science tools and techniques with NLP and should be ready to work independently as well as manage and mentor a team of junior Data Scientists
2. The candidate should be able to understand the nature of text for different use cases and apply the extraction/cleaning/pre-processing logic to generate the most useful data and features from it in the most efficient manner
3. Candidates having good grasp on various NL constructs like Parts of Speech, Sentence structures, Subject – Verb – Object relationships, word dependencies (ROOT, compound, etc.) will be preferred
4. Experience of working with multi-lingual data and understanding of nuances of working with different language scripts in NLP will be an added advantage
projects.title: Need a Data Scientist

projects.preview_description: We are looking to hire an independent contractor who is an expert in optimizing large scale MySQL da
projects.description:
We are looking to hire an independent contractor who is an expert in optimizing large scale MySQL databases and has extensive experience in building Data Reporting/Exporting Dashboards. Ideal candidate must have experience in using AWS and demonstrated ability to provide project plans, budget and timelines for projects that will be defined by management.  Contractor must have at least 5 years of experience in using and optimizing MySQL databases of tens of millions of records each, automating reports and data loading/offloading from and to the database and development experience in building usable and fast data dashboards. Moreover, contractor must have experience in Merge/Purge/Data Matching operations in large-scale databases.

Description of Services

Database Administration
o	Organizing and Optimizing database schemas and table structures.
o	MySQL data uploading, exporting, reporting, creating new schemas on specifications provided by Management.
o	Defining procedures for data matching / merge-purge operations and data reporting.

Server Administration
o	Configuring and maintaining windows and linux based servers on AWS.
o	Monitoring network and server performance.
o	Executing applications on infrastructure.
o	Deploying and configuring AWS EC2, RDS, S3 and Route54 services.

Development
o	Executing / Modifying / Monitoring Python-based data processing applications.
o	Developing API integration scripts that use third-party sources to populate data into MySQL.

Reporting & Dashboards
o	Creating reporting tables, stored procedures and views based on specifications from Management
o	Optimizing MySQL metrics using schema normalization techniques, indexes and partitioning.
o	Develop custom-built dashboards for data reporting from MySQL and other third-party APIs.

Organization & Management
o	Keeping up-to-date code and documentation repositories in Github and Google Drive.
o	Monitoring usage of AWS Resources.
o	Implementing and Maintaining Backup Schedules for entire infrastructure (including AWS, Google Apps Suite, Github) and DRP measures (Disaster Recovery Procedures).
o	Managing development and production timelines assigned for each task or service.
o	Tracking & Reporting hours on a weekly basis

Contractor must have availability to engage at a minimum of 25 hours a week and be fluent in English both in verbal and written word.
projects.title: Superstar Database Administrator / Dashboard Expert
